titleStmt.title: A vindication of baptizing beleevers infants. In some animadversions upon Mr. Tombes his Exercitations about infant baptisme; as also upon his Examen, as touching the antiquities and authors by him alledged or contradicted that concern the same. Humbly submitted to the judgement of all candid Christians, / by Nathanael Homes. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Homes, Nathanael, 1599-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M. Simmons, and are to be sold by Benjamin Allen at the signe of the Crowne in Popes-head Alley.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Tombes, John. Two treatises and an appendix to them concerning infant-baptisme (Wing T1825), which contains both the "Excercitation" (Wing T1805) and the "Examen".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 20th 1645"; the second 6 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crowne in Popes-head Alley.
